Section.Title: Use in Cancer
Section.Para: Panitumumab is approved to treat adults with:

ItemizedList.ListItem: Colorectal cancer that has spread to other parts of the body. It is used:with FOLFOX combination chemotherapy as the first treatment in patients whose cancer does not have an abnormal RAS genealone in patients whose cancer does not have an abnormal RAS gene and got worse after treatment with chemotherapy that contained oxaliplatin, irinotecan hydrochloride, and a fluoropyrimidinewith sotorasib for the treatment of patients with an abnormal KRAS gene who have received chemotherapy that included a fluoropyrimidine, oxaliplatin, and irinotecan hydrochloride

Section.Para: Panitumumab is also being studied in the treatment of other types of cancer.
